definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Arsenic has a diffusion coefficient an order of magnitude lower than that of boron and phosphorous.
sentences.chinese: 砷的扩散系数比硼和磷低一个数量级。

sentences.english: But these differences was not very significant, diversed in the same order of magnitude.
sentences.chinese: 但是这些差别不显著，都维持在同一数量级上。

sentences.english: With local indexes, the time for roll-in is reduced by orders of magnitude.
sentences.chinese: 利用本地索引，滚入时间可得到数量级的降低。

sentences.english: These figures show that the improvement of input impedance is within a factor of ten.
sentences.chinese: 这些数据表明，输入阻抗的改进值为一个数量级。

sentences.english: In annular space, the values of tangential, axial and radial turbulence intensity were of the same order of magnitude.
sentences.chinese: 环形空间3个速度分量的湍流度是同一个数量级的。

sentences.english: Other witnesses have reported numbers of a similar order of magnitude.
sentences.chinese: 其他见证者报告的数量级类似。

sentences.english: In the last 10 years researchers have advanced by roughly an order of magnitude.
sentences.chinese: 在过去10年中，研究人员大约前进了一个数量级。

sentences.english: We'll still get, we still do get, about the same order of magnitude.
sentences.chinese: 那么我们会发现，平动动能贡献相同的数量级。

sentences.english: The eventual losses could run to several hundred billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 最终的资金损失，可能要达到千亿数量级。

sentences.english: Maximum signal currents are of the order of 50 ma.
sentences.chinese: 最大信号电流是在50毫安这个数量级。

sentences.english: And the available volume is on the order of meters cubed.
sentences.chinese: 整个可用的空间体积有立方米的数量级。

sentences.english: That’s an order of magnitude higher than the tallest building in most countries.
sentences.chinese: 这一个数量级高于大多数国家最高的建筑标准。

sentences.english: About 10 orders of magnitude have also been gained on the temperature scale.
sentences.chinese: 约十个数量级的温标被用来量度。
我们一下子跌了3个数量级。

definition: nanosecond, ns, 10^-9 s (PRC)/Taiwan equivalent: 奈秒[nai4 miao3]
mega electron volt MeV (unit of energy equal to 1.6 x 10-13 Joules)
